Rooms.Name: Zone Description for the City of Iuel

Objects.Name: tablet message iuel
Objects.Description: A large tablet of Ieul hangs on the wall bearing messages for the common folk.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Ever since the sun has set upon the eastern skys, and fallen every day to adarken reign.  Parables of Nox roam the land abound and beyond.  Strong andmighty warriors magicicians and those of lesser known march the ground mortalfear to thread on.  But times grew short, the wars plagued the realms and deathhad flexed it's wings.  Masses and mobs killings took place.  Sacrifices ofblood and bone soaked the grounds, making it moist and hungry for more.  Thewar of the immortals was at it's darkest hour.  800 years later.  The warsended, leaving only the fittest to survive.  These great legends were loved andfeared, their faces to be thought unworthy to look upon, by mere mortals.They were to be Gods and Greater Gods.  Casting the rotting and part soiledremains of their victims into a pit and burried it far away from the town thatwas built for the living.  Life soon begin to spawn by itself.  Life as itseems cannot be stopped, and those that was once dead.  Are now known only tobe called commonly as the Undead.  In the land of Iuel this massgraverejuvinates it's movements and sends forth a great army of fearsome creatures.Wrecking havoc in the city around, with skills so great, and magic so potent.The wars between the living and the dead, has now just begun.  A place to rest,away from the living.  They mock me, but soon they will die.  Everyone has todie.

Objects.Name: odylic face mask
Objects.Description: A face mask gathering the surrounding forces of nature lays here translucent.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The face mask is transparent, practically invisble and covers the entirehead.

Objects.Name: odylic breastplate
Objects.Description: An enchanted translucent breastplate lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The breastplate is unbelievably light and made from a see through material.

Objects.Name: odylic sandals
Objects.Description: A pair of barely visible odylic sandals lay here collecting energy.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The sandals are made from a strange transparent material, they fit snugglyand offer good protection and mobility.

Objects.Name: odylic wristlock
Objects.Description: Looks like someone has escaped an odylic wristlock, and just left it here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These strange restraints can now be worn about the wrists, offering greaterprotection and even empowering your limbs with a strange feeling of strength.

Objects.Name: odylic ring
Objects.Description: Small rings eluminating with odylic energy lays here nearly unseen.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The transparaent ring glows with an unearthly light.  It emanates a feelingof power and lust to help bring forth death.

Objects.Name: odylic shield
Objects.Description: A large shield bursting with energy lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The shield has a strange feeling of other worldly power and protection, it'slight and see through material is surprisingly durable.

Objects.Name: odylic amulet
Objects.Description: An odylic amulet lays here collecting impurities.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The powerful amulet brings forth a lust for battle and blood.  It's powerinvigorating and empowering it's wearer.

Objects.Name: odylic greaves leg plates
Objects.Description: A pair of darken, battered odylic leg plates lay here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The odylic greaves though transparent have a dark presence that seems to betrapped within the magical armor.

Objects.Name: odylic shoulder plates
Objects.Description: Some odylic should plates lay here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The plates seem to magically mold into the desired shape of whom everattempts to wear them.

Objects.Name: vampire cloak
Objects.Description: A stunning cloak made from an erotic red velvet lays here wasted.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This blood red cloak is made from a thick velvet material that seems to flowaround it's wearer.

Objects.Name: odylic gauntlets
Objects.Description: Some odylic gauntlets lay here absorbing odylic energy.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The strange transparent material is very flexible and seems to form to thewearers hand when worn.

Objects.Name: odylic scabbard slate piece
Objects.Description: A piece of odylic slate lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The strange transparent material seems to have been the scabbard from astrange sword.

Objects.Name: long bone
Objects.Description: A really long bone, belonging to a incredibly huge creature lays here now.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This strange bone has a feeling of power and anger about it.  It would makea great weapon for bludgeoning someone to a pulp.

Objects.Name: spiked handwrap
Objects.Description: A handwrap with elugated spikes pertuding is here on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This handwrapping is inlayed with deadly spikes with which would do a numberon someone if punched.

Objects.Name: broad tempered scimitar fillet knife
Objects.Description: An enormously huge fillet knife is here, ready to fillet the world's largest tuna.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The blade is long and polished, making it a deadly weapon.

Objects.Name: dancing fire soul weapon
Objects.Description: A rough looking weapon is here burnt for all it's made for.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This abandoned soul has been transformed into a weapon, and now seemsuseless.

Objects.Name: twig spikey
Objects.Description: A spikey twig lays on the ground waiting for you to step on.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This strange twig has a strange feeling to it.  It seems to fade in and outof existence.

Objects.Name: water soaked branch moss wood greeny
Objects.Description: A greeny moss covered piece of wood lays here.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: water soaked branch moss wood greeny
Objects.ExtraDescription: The branch seems to glow red and blue on each end seeming to detect somestrange presence.

Objects.Name: algae green blue stick
Objects.ShortDescription: a blue and green algae covered stick
Objects.Description: A green and blue stick covered in algae lays here on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The stick seems rotten, and diseased, but it's magical qualities make itvery apparent.

Objects.Name: red yellow algae stick
Objects.ShortDescription: a red and yellow algae covered stick
Objects.Description: A red and yellow algae covered stick lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The stick is remarkably strong for it's size and condition.

Objects.Name: blue brown algae stick
Objects.ShortDescription: a blue and brown algae covered stick
Objects.Description: A blue and brown algae covered stick lays here on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This stick has a homey feeling to it.

Objects.Name: brown maroon algae stick
Objects.ShortDescription: a brown and maroon algae covered stick
Objects.Description: A brown and marron algae covered stick lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The stick smells faintly of the ocean and is extremely sodden.

Objects.Name: slimy green moss covered twig
Objects.ShortDescription: a slimy green moss covered twig
Objects.Description: A slimy green moss covered twig lays here on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The stick has a strange evil blessing emanating from within itself.

Objects.Name: dead olive twig
Objects.Description: A twig taken from a dead olive tree lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This twig seemed to have once been ill and diseased but has now miraculouslyrecovered.

Objects.Name: rotting white bark
Objects.Description: A piece of bark ripped from a tree has been left here rotting.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The bark seems to have aged beyond it's normal years.  As if it's life hadbeen magically quickened.

Objects.Name: water damaged tree bark
Objects.Description: A tree bark soaked too long in water has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The bark has the strange ability to detect forms of magic.

Objects.Name: dried deer penis
Objects.ShortDescription: a dried up penis of a deer
Objects.Description: A dried up animal's groin lays here smelling really bad.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This disgusting extremity could make you drop or junk anything.

Objects.Name: rhino horn
Objects.Description: A rhino's horn lays here on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The horn is dull and worn from age.  It seems to fade in and out ofexistence, as if it was partially invisible.

Objects.Name: nun nipple
Objects.Description: A very disgusting nipple has been ripped off some poor woman and sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The nipple has a strange ability to rejuvenate it's user.

Objects.Name: good knight testicle
Objects.Description: A pair of very small testicles sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The testicle is shriveled and extremely small.  After seeing this youbelieve you could see anything.

Objects.Name: mind altering smelling bag
Objects.Description: A bag sits here on the ground smelling very tempting.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This strange bag has the ability to rejuvenate those who dwell in themystical arts.

Objects.Name: brass visor
Objects.Description: A brass rim made from badly forged brass lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The brass visor is poorly made and in need of a good shining.

Objects.Name: brass chestplate
Objects.Description: A long slate of brass lays here covering a lot of other equipment.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The chestplate has been beaten and bloodied from use.  Not very appealing,but it would offer minimal protection.

Objects.Name: horn scaled sleeve
Objects.ShortDescription: a pair of horn scaled sleeves
Objects.Description: A sleeve made from boiled and cut horn lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These sleeves are very unique, made from horns of an unidentifiable beastthey are extremely durable.

Objects.Name: horn scaled leg plates
Objects.Description: A longish plate made from scaled horns lay here
Objects.ExtraDescription: These leg plates are made from durable horns, very strange and uniquedesign.

Objects.Name: brass gauntlets
Objects.Description: A pair of gauntlets made from shining brass lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A set of brass hammered gauntlets.  Very stiff and unflexible, they are notvery well suited for maneuverability, but they do offer good protection.

Objects.Name: brass wrist wrap
Objects.ShortDescription: a brass supported cloth wrist wrap
Objects.Description: A piece of cloth with a brass bar in the middle lays here on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The brass piece is completely wrapped in cloth.  Making a very stiff andsupportive guard.

Objects.Name: brass neck piece
Objects.Description: A ring of brass lays here on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The ring of brass has a small clasp that can be opened to place it aroundthe neck.

Objects.Name: mossy webbed feet
Objects.Description: A pair of green covered slimy mossy feet lay here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This strange footwear is extremely awkward looking, but it may be usefulover watery terrain.

Objects.Name: black wood buckler
Objects.Description: A flat piece of black wood lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The black wood appears to have been hardened by flame.  The tempering hasgiven it a smooth black polish.

Objects.Name: phoenix wings
Objects.Description: A pair of red and gold wings is here half burried.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These strange wings can be placed about your body.

Objects.Name: broadsword Iuel
Objects.Description: A broadsword made from an incredible weaponsmith lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The blade is finely honed and polished.  An excellent weapon for almost anybattle.

Objects.Name: Ieulish gray sword
Objects.Description: A medium sized sword made from a land far away sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The sword is made from an unkown material.  It's gray shine like that ofmetal, but it is not metal.

Objects.Name: ieulish battleaxe
Objects.Description: A battleaxe from the land of Ieul is sits here humming.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The axehead is two-headed, made from a strange gray material.  The head ismounted on an oaken handle.

Objects.Name: iuelish polearm
Objects.Description: A polearm from the land of Ieul stands against the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The polearm is about two spans in length equipped with a nasty looking bladeon it's end.

Objects.Name: war mallet iuel
Objects.Description: A large headed war mallet from the land of Iuel is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The mallet is made from a strange gray material.  It's head large and blunt.The handle long and thin.

Objects.Name: tiger sabertooth tooth
Objects.Description: The tooth of a grand sabertooth now lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The long tooth is over a hands length.  It's point very sharp, making it anexcellent weapon.

Objects.Name: ieulic spiked ball chain
Objects.ShortDescription: an Iuelic spiked ball and chain
Objects.Description: A spiked ball connected to a long wooden handle lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The spike ball is about the size of a human head.  Attach to a long chainwith a small handle.

Objects.Name: weed vine iuel
Objects.ShortDescription: a weed vine from the wetlands of Iuel
Objects.Description: A short rope made from vines lay here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The vine has been weaved into a makeshift whip.

Objects.Name: odylic spike iuel
Objects.Description: A sharp very long spiked jets out from the ground here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The spike is about an arms length long and sharpened to a fine point.

Objects.Name: vault banks
Objects.Description: The bank vault lies open, waiting for someone to try to enter.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The bank vault stands wide open.  All the coins and loot inside are fullyvisible and ripe for the taking.  Except for a strange presence that you canfeel but not see.  Many have tried to loot from this bank, but the unseenspirits have caused them to always fail.  Only a fool attempts to steal fromthe dead city of Iuel.

Objects.Name: rare gem
Objects.Description: A gem, sparkling and rare in all favors is stuck in the ground

Objects.Name: lower gem
Objects.Description: A blackish gem with the weight of a dead corpse is stuck here in the ground

Objects.Name: middle gem
Objects.Description: A piece of mud like solid is stuck in the ground.

Objects.Name: level gem
Objects.Description: A long flat gem is here balancing itself one a small twig
